original_text: And they went out and fled from the tomb, for trembling and astonishment had seized them, and they said nothing to anyone, for they were afraid.
korean_text: 여자들이 몹시 놀라 떨며 나와 무덤에서 도망하고 무서워하여 아무에게 아무 말도 하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: for trembling and astonishment had seized them
and they said nothing to anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무에게도 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다
